active_incidents.title: A small percentage of users are experiencing issues with Slack.

notes.body: Some users may still be experiencing trouble in Slack, specifically with sending and editing messages, loading threads, and joining channels. These features are working slowly for some users, and not working at all for others. We’ll continue to provide updates as we know more.

We're receiving reports that a small percentage of users are experiencing issues with loading and sending messages. We're actively looking into this, and we'll report back as more information becomes available.

active_incidents.title: Some users are reporting issues triggering shortcut Workflows

notes.body: We’re still looking into the cause of the executing workflows issue, and we’ll provide new information as soon as it’s available. We apologize for the continued trouble.
Some users are reporting issues triggering shortcut Workflows at the moment. The team are currently working hard to fix this. We're very sorry for any inconvenience caused in the meantime.
